00062 EagleDbSqlValue* EagleDbSqlValue_NewWithString(char *str, EagleBoolean process)
00063 {
00064     EagleDbSqlValue *v = (EagleDbSqlValue*) EagleMemory_Allocate("EagleDbSqlValue_NewWithString.1", sizeof(EagleDbSqlValue));
00065     if(NULL == v) {
00066         return NULL;
00067     }
00068     
00069     v->expressionType = EagleDbSqlExpressionTypeValue;
00070     v->type = EagleDbSqlValueTypeString;
00071     
00072     if(EagleFalse == process) {
00073         v->value.identifier = (NULL == str ? NULL : strdup(str));
00074     }
00075     else {
00076         /* process the string */
00077         unsigned long len, i, j;
00078         char *pstr;
00079         
00080         len = strlen(str);
00081         pstr = (char*) EagleMemory_Allocate("EagleDbSqlValue_NewWithString.2", len + 1);
00082         if(NULL == pstr) {
00083             EagleMemory_Free(v);
00084             return NULL;
00085         }
00086         
00087         for(i = 1, j = 0; i < len - 1; ++i, ++j) {
00088             if((str[i] == '\\' && str[i + 1] == '\'') || (str[i] == '\'' && str[i + 1] == '\'')) {
00089                 pstr[j] = '\'';
00090                 ++i;
00091             }
00092             else {
00093                 pstr[j] = str[i];
00094             }
00095         }
00096         pstr[len - 2] = '\0';
00097         
00098         v->value.identifier = (char*) pstr;
00099     }
00100     
00101     return v;
00102 }

00104 void EagleDbSqlValue_Delete(EagleDbSqlValue *value)
00105 {
00106     if(NULL == value) {
00107         return;
00108     }
00109     
00110     switch(value->type) {
00111             
00112         case EagleDbSqlValueTypeAsterisk:
00113         case EagleDbSqlValueTypeInteger:
00114         case EagleDbSqlValueTypeFloat:
00115             break;
00116             
00117         case EagleDbSqlValueTypeIdentifier:
00118         case EagleDbSqlValueTypeString:
00119             EagleMemory_Free(value->value.identifier);
00120             break;
00121             
00122     }
00123     
00124     EagleMemory_Free(value);
00125 }

00229 EagleBoolean EagleDbSqlValue_castable(EagleDbSqlValue *value, EagleDataType type)
00230 {
00231     EagleBoolean canCast;
00232     
00233     switch(type) {
00234             
00235         case EagleDataTypeInteger:
00236             EagleDbSqlValue_getInteger(value, &canCast);
00237             break;
00238             
00239         case EagleDataTypeFloat:
00240             EagleDbSqlValue_getFloat(value, &canCast);
00241             break;
00242             
00243         case EagleDataTypeUnknown:
00244             canCast = EagleFalse;
00245             break;
00246             
00247         case EagleDataTypeVarchar:
00248             EagleDbSqlValue_getVarchar(value, &canCast);
00249             break;
00250             
00251     }
00252     
00253     return canCast;
